title: @Riot: Have you ever considered skins based on the passage of time?
body:
Like Adult {{champion:1}} , Adult {{champion:20}} , Adult {{champion:32}} , Young {{champion:42}} , Young {{champion:41}} , Young {{champion:74}} , Before-death {{champion:30}} , Young {{champion:107}} , Young {{champion:13}} , Before-experiment {{champion:27}} , Before-death {{champion:14}} , Young {{champion:50}} , Young {{champion:48}} , Young {{champion:77}} , Before-ummm...dissection? {{champion:6}} , Young {{champion:8}} , Before-transformation {{champion:19}} , Befofe-...ummm...ascension? {{champion:101}} , and Young {{champion:26}} ?

Edit:
> [{quoted}](name=Eeveefyre,realm=NA,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=fLaloFPA,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2014-12-16T01:15:53.856+0000)
>
> Pre-Exile Riven would be a nice add on to her skin list. 
> 
>  Pre-Void Malzahar, Maybe... 
> 
> Human Orriana? 
> 
> Pre-Annexation Brand?
> 
> infact, i could see a Purified Morgana and Corrupted Kayle, one for each timeline where the other wins the war.. 
> 
> Another thing i'd like to see.. Helmetless Lissandra.. i'd always imagine her with Fox ears, like ahri, due to that freaking huge helmet..

> [{quoted}](name=2ManyJons,realm=NA,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=fLaloFPA,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2014-12-16T01:29:07.958+0000)
>
> I'd rather see a story change skin.
> 
> More than anything I'd love to see Lucian's Legendary Skin be Senna, where thresh trapped Lucian and took his soul instead.

> [{quoted}](name=Polaritie,realm=NA,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=fLaloFPA,comment-id=000100000003,timestamp=2014-12-16T02:01:56.590+0000)
>

Can we at least have concept sketches for some of these?

Actually. That would be cool. @Riot KateyKhaos (NA). Pass it around?

> [{quoted}](name=Kacedean,realm=NA,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=fLaloFPA,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2014-12-16T04:14:22.628+0000)
>
> I think that a pre-discredited, pre-roboticized {{champion:112}}  would make for a neat skin. The young inventor, full of bright-eyed hope, ambition, and humanity would provide a neat contrast to his current form.
> 
> Also, pre-Lunari, disciple of the Solari {{champion:131}}. Again, the contrast between the bookish, curious younger Diana and the vengeance-driven current one would be neat. Alternatively, future (alternate-future?) skins for {{champion:89}} and {{champion:131}} in which the two celestial paragons have reconciled could be neat.
> 
> And I'd like to second the purified {{champion:25}} / corrupted {{champion:10}} suggestion. There's a lot of really neat things that could be done there.

> [{quoted}](name=Busty Demoness,realm=NA,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=fLaloFPA,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2015-09-04T19:48:49.053+0000)
>
> I'm mildly amused that through the entire thread there was no mention of Exiled Morgana, which is basically Morgana before the corruption had fully taken her body, but after she turned to dark magics.
> 
> Purified Morgana/Corrupted Kayle would really just be switching who was on which side.
> 
> Also, according to her lore, Riven was part of Noxus until her conscience kicked in and she defected.
> 
> I think a really cool skin concept in terms of time would be Human Orianna (since her creator did base Orianna off his dead daughter).
